name: The Rebels
startIntroPart1: We are the spark in the darkness, the defiance whispered from shadows. Our banner flies, soon to eclipse your empires.
startIntroPart2: Our struggle has just begun. The old order will tremble before the new dawn we usher in.
declaringWar: Your tyranny ends now! Freedom shall echo across the lands!
attacked: You mistake our pursuit of liberty for weakness! You will regret this defiance!
defeated: This fight is but a skirmish! The spirit of rebellion cannot be extinguished!
introduction: We are the harbinger of change, the whisper of freedom. Your old order trembles.
neutralHello: So, another seeks our counsel. What is your purpose?
neutralLetsHearIt: Time is a luxury we rarely afford.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, our immediate objectives have been secured. The path to true freedom demands continued vigilance.
tradeRequest: Our cause requires resources. Consider this an... opportunity.
